title: Can Nairo Quintana Repay Movistar’s Faith with a Return to GC Glory? ‘He’ll Have the Opportunity to Show He’s Still a Winner’
content:
Movistar convinced 33-year-old Quintana can still be competitive despite year out of racing following tramadol positive.

Read the full article at Can Nairo Quintana Repay Movistar’s Faith with a Return to GC Glory? ‘He’ll Have the Opportunity to Show He’s Still a Winner’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
